name: Estellium Legends- Boom Pow Pack
detailed_description:
Do you like explosions and hentai? Well then this DLC is for you!

Purchase this pack today to get the best of both worlds. You get these items below:

-Two High Quality Hentai Images *One Straight, One Gay.* (Viewable in Arena Mode or Chapter 5 of Story Mode).
-Two Doom Blasters. They are deadly explosive items that clear any fight in seconds.
-Ether Maxwell *An upcoming main character from a future project.* (Ether is a Maginitus, a magical swordsman who uses Ruin magic as well as Sword Magic and Breltha Skills.)

short_description: Do you like explosions and hentai? Well then this DLC is for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista(sp2) / 7 / 8 / 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows 8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

legal_notice: Estellium Legends is the sole property of Syu-Syu and Team Syukino.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contains 18+ sexual images of characters over the age of 18.
